references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces NeRF, a foundational work in novel view synthesis that heavily influences the current paper's HDR view synthesis method.

references.paper_title: Nerf in the dark: High dynamic range view synthesis from noisy raw images
references.reason: This paper directly addresses HDR view synthesis from noisy RAW images, which is the core problem this paper solves, improving upon its training time and rendering speed.

references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces 3D Gaussian Splatting (3DGS), the foundation upon which this paper's novel approach for fast training and real-time rendering is built.

references.paper_title: Mip-nerf: A multiscale representation for anti-aliasing neural radiance fields
references.reason: This paper introduces Mip-NeRF, which addresses the anti-aliasing issue in NeRF, relevant to this paper's goal of high-quality HDR image rendering.

references.paper_title: Mip-NeRF 360: Unbounded anti-aliased neural radiance fields
references.reason: This extends the Mip-NeRF approach to unbounded scenes, relevant to this paper's broader application and scope.
